      • getDatabasePort

        String getDatabasePort()
        Returns:
        the port that the database should run on

      • getDatabaseProperties

        String getDatabaseProperties()
        Returns:
        a path to a properties file that contains database configuration settings

      • getInputFiles

        String[] getInputFiles()
        Returns an array that alternates between a portname and path to a file containing the input values. Therefore the array will always contain an even number of elements
        Returns:
        an array of portname and path to files containing individual inputs.

      • getInputValues

        String[] getInputValues()
        Returns an array that alternates between a portname and an input values. Therefore the array will always contain an even number of elements.
        Returns:
        an array of portname and individual inputs.

      • getInputBundle

        String getInputBundle()
        Return the path for a data bundle which should be used for input values. This option can't be used together with getInputFiles() or getInputValues()

      • getLogFile

        String getLogFile()

      • getOutputDirectory

        String getOutputDirectory()
        Returns:
        the directory to write the results to

      • getStartDatabase

        boolean getStartDatabase()

      • getCredentialManagerDir

        String getCredentialManagerDir()
        Returns:
        the directory with Credential Manager's files

                      throws InvalidOptionException
